name: SPACE TRASH (RhysNorton)
description:
Navigate and scavenge dangerous debris fields from your claustrophobic cockpit.

Controls:
Steer - WASD / Right Stick
Forward Thrusters - Space / A
Backward Thrusters - Left Shift / B
Interact - E / X
Shoot - F / Right Trigger
Pause - Escape / Menu

This project was made as part of the November AGD Tiny Slam Jam. The theme was arcade.
